Call forth a cloud of chaotic anima that travels to the target enemy, dealing {1} Shadow damage to enemies in its path. When the anima reaches the target it explodes, inflicting either Curse of Weakness or Curse of Tongues, and dealing {2} Shadow damage over {3} sec to all nearby enemies.

Hurl bolts of decimating magic at your target, dealing {1} Shadow damage and increasing the damage of your next {2} Demonbolts by {3}%.

Decimating Bolt's damage, and the bonus to Shadow Bolt both increase as your target's health decreases.

0.Text: Each Soul Shard spent on Hand of Gul'dan increases the damage of your next Call Dreadstalkers by {1}%.
After your Demonic Tyrant expires, gain a stack of Demonic Core and increase the damage your demons deal by {FFFFFFFF|{1}%} for {2} sec.

Your Hand of Gul'dan has a {1}% chance per Soul Shard to summon a Malicious Imp. When slain, Malicious Imp will either deal {2} Fire damage to all nearby enemies of your Implosion or deal it to your current target.
Deals {1} Shadowflame damage to the target.
Deals {1} Shadowflame damage to nearby enemies.
Restores {1} of their summoner's Soul Shards.
While Agony, Corruption, and Unstable Affliction are active, your Shadow Bolt has a {1}% chance to make your next Malefic Rapture cost no Soul Shards and cast instantly.

1.Text: While Agony, Corruption, and Unstable Affliction are active, your Drain Soul has a {1}% chance to make your next Malefic Rapture cost no Soul Shards and cast instantly.

0.Text: Every {1} Soul Shards spent grants Ritual of Ruin, making your next Chaos Bolt or Rain of Fire consume no Soul Shards and have no cast time.

Summons a Blasphemy from the Twisting Nether, impacting for {1} Fire damage and stunning all enemies in the area for {2} sec.

The Blasphemy will serve you for {3} sec, dealing {4} damage to all nearby enemies every {5} sec and generating {6} Soul Shard Fragment every {7} sec.
The Blasphemy ignites, dealing {1} Shadowflame damage to all targets.
Damage taken reduced by {1}%.
Deals {1} Chaos damage over {2} sec.
Blasts the enemy target with a bolt of fel magic, causing {1} Shadowflame damage.
When Agony grants you a Soul Shard, you have a chance to gain Cruel Inspiration, increasing your haste by {1}% for {2} sec.
Cruel Inspiration also grants {1} charges of Cruel Epiphany, up to {2} charges. Each charge of Cruel Epiphany increases the damage of your next Malefic Rapture or Seed of Corruption by {3}%.
Consuming Soul Shards has a chance to grant you Chaos Maelstrom, increasing your critical strike chance by {1}% for {2} sec.
Demonbolt has a chance to make your next Hand of Gul'dan instant and deal {1}% increased damage.
Demonfire bolts increase your Fire damage by {1}% for {2} sec, stacking up to {3} times. Gaining a stack does not refresh the duration. Casting Channel Demonfire resets this effect.
Grimoire: Felguard damage increased by {1}%. While Grimoire: Felguard is active, all of your demons deal {2}% additional damage.
Enemies damaged by Phantom Singularity gain Infirmity for its duration and enemies damaged by Vile Taint gain Infirmity for {1} sec, increasing damage taken by {2}%.
Your Soulstone tethers your ally's soul to a floating orb.
Bilescourge Bombers deal {1}% increased damage, and your spells now have a chance to summon a Bilescourge Bomber.
Chaos Bolt damage increased by {1}%. Rain of Fire damage increased by {2}%. Shadowburn damage increased by {3}%.

Consuming a Demonic Core applies a Doom Brand that explodes after {1} sec, dealing {2} Shadow damage to nearby enemies or {3} Shadow damage to a single enemy. Hand of Gul'dan reduces the duration of your Doom Brands by {4} sec per Soul Shard spent.

When Doom Brand is removed, you have a chance to summon a Doomfiend that casts {1} Doom Bolt Volleys before departing. Each Doom Bolt Volley deals {2} Shadow damage to up to {3} enemies or {4} Shadow damage to a single enemy.

Soul Rot grants {1} Umbrafire Kindling which increase the damage of your next Malefic Rapture to deal {2}% or your next Seed of Corruption by {3}%. Additionally, Umbrafire Kindling causes Malefic Rapture to extend the duration of your damage over time effects and Haunt by {4} sec.
Summons a Flame Rift.
Bolts from Dimensional Rifts now deal {1}% of damage dealt to nearby enemies. Immolate periodic damage has a chance to grant a charge of Dimensional Rift.

Soul Strike deals {1}% increased damage and generates a Soul Shard.

Reduces the cast time of Summon Vilefiend by {2} sec and your Vilefiend now deals {3} Nature damage to nearby enemies every {4} sec while active.
